unnormalised: New Delhi: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) is located at Electronics Niketan, 6, CGO Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi – 110003. It's a key institution for India's tech policies.
normalised: New Delhi: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (M-e-i-T-Y) is located at Electronics Niketan, six, C-G-O Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi – one hundred and ten thousand and three. It's a key institution for India's tech policies.

unnormalised: The Department of Telecommunications (DoT) resides at Sanchar Bhawan, 20, Ashoka Road, New Delhi-110001. The DoT oversees all telecom operations across the country.
normalised: The Department of Telecommunications (D-o-T) resides at Sanchar Bhawan, twenty, Ashoka Road, New Delhi-one hundred and ten thousand and one. The D-o-T oversees all telecom operations across the country.

unnormalised: The headquarters of the Election Commission of India (ECI) can be found at Nirvachan Sadan, Ashoka Road, New Delhi - 110001. It's where decisions about Indian elections are made.
normalised: The headquarters of the Election Commission of India (E-C-I) can be found at Nirvachan Sadan, Ashoka Road, New Delhi - one hundred and ten thousand and one. It's where decisions about Indian elections are made.

unnormalised: The University Grants Commission (UGC) operates from Bahadur Shah Zafar Marg, New Delhi, Pin: 110002. This body is essential for higher education standards nationwide.
normalised: The University Grants Commission (U-G-C) operates from Bahadur Shah Zafar Marg, New Delhi, Pin: one hundred and ten thousand and two. This body is essential for higher education standards nationwide.

unnormalised: The National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) is situated at Sri Aurobindo Marg, New Delhi, postal code 110016. They develop curriculum and textbooks for Indian schools. Knowing these addresses is helpful for any citizen who needs to contact these vital governmental and educational bodies.
normalised: The National Council of Educational Research and Training (N-C-E-R-T) is situated at Sri Aurobindo Marg, New Delhi, postal code one hundred and ten thousand and sixteen. They develop curriculum and textbooks for Indian schools. Knowing these addresses is helpful for any citizen who needs to contact these vital governmental and educational bodies.
